system.description: Phantoms appear to be transparent humanoids. Often mistaken for Ghosts, these more dangerous undead are a common form that Haunts will take.

overview.base: You count as being undead for the purposes of abilities, damage, and other effects. You also gain Ethereal Senses, Healing Sensitivity, Slow Mana Drain, Undead Mind, and Undying Durability.
You go Ethereal or manifest back into the Material Realm.
You cannot wear armor and you may pass through non-silver walls while Ethereal. You are also immune to being snared.
You gain @Ability[Offensive Martial Arts]{Offensive Martial Arts} and @Ability[Defensive Martial Arts]{Defensive Martial Arts}.

You fly at quarter speed and can glide over terrain and other obstacles at normal speed. However, you cannot move more than a couple feet above the ground. You fall at the rate of 30 feet per round (30 feet per 5 seconds).

Your @Equipment[Hand]{hands} count as @Wiki[Category:Weapons]{weapons} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be @Property[Shattered]{shattered} or @Property[Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @Core[Attack Interaction]{attack} with them and their damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].

overview.base:
Your @Equipment[Hand]{hands} count as @Wiki[Category:Shields]{shields} for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be @Property[Shattered]{shattered} or @Property[Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @Core[Block Interaction]{block} with them and their @Wiki[Core:Block Value]{BV} is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands @Property[Blocking]{blocking}.
You can see and hear spirits and Ethereal creatures.

Healing can be used to damage you. If the creature providing you healing specifies that they are doing so "for damage" then you roll your largest hit die and take that much holy damage instead of the normal healing effect. This does not consume any of your hit dice.
Deal enough mana drain to kill the target. If this successfully kills the target, you revitalize.
You are immune to being frightened or charmed.

You are immune to unconsciousness, suffocating, and being poisoned. You do not drop due to being at negative HP. You still die when you reach half your maximum HP below zero. You also do not have to breathe.
